Global

Global

Type Definitions

AliasGroup

Properties:
Name Type Description
ORGS string

Different groups of aliases. Currently only support orgs.

AnyDictionary

An object with arbitrary string-indexed values of any type.

Type:
  • Dictionary.<any>

AnyJson

Any valid JSON value.

Type:
  • boolean | number | string | null | JsonArray | JsonMap

AuthFields

Properties:
Name Type Description
accessToken string
alias string
authCode string
clientId string
clientSecret string
created string
createdOrgInstance string
devHubUsername string
instanceUrl string
isDevHub string
loginUrl string
orgId string
password string
privateKey string
refreshToken string
scratchAdminUsername string
userId string
username string
usernames string
userProfileName string

Fields for authorization, organization, and local information.

ConfigContents

The type of content a config stores.

Type:
  • Map.<string, ConfigValue>

ConfigEntry

Properties:
Name Type Description
key string
value ConfigValue

The type of entries in a config store defined by the key and value type of ConfigContents.

Type:
  • object

ConfigGroupOptions

Properties:
Name Type Description
defaultGroup string

The default group for properties to go into.

Options when creating the config file. Extends ConfigOptions.

Type:
  • object

ConfigInfo

Properties:
Name Type Description
key string

The config key.
value string | boolean

The config value.
location LOCATIONS

The location of the config property.
path string

The path of the config value.
isLocal function

() => boolean Location is LOCATIONS.LOCAL.
isGlobal function

() => boolean Location is LOCATIONS.GLOBAL.
isEnvVar function

() => boolean Location is LOCATIONS.ENVIRONMENT.

Information about a config property.

ConfigOptions

Properties:
Name Type Description
rootFolder string

The root folder where the config file is stored.
filename string

The file name.
isGlobal boolean

If the file is in the global or project directory.
isState boolean

If the file is in the state folder or no (.sfdx).
filePath string

The full file path where the config file is stored.

Options when creating the config file.

Type:
  • object

ConfigPropertyMeta

Properties:
Name Type Description
key string

The config property name.
value input

Reference to the config data input validation.
hidden boolean

True if the property should be indirectly hidden from the user.
encrypted boolean

True if the property values should be stored encrypted.

Contains meta information about sfdx config properties.

Type:
  • object

ConfigPropertyMetaInput

Properties:
Name Type Description
validator function

Test if the input value is valid.
failedMessage string

The message to return in the error if the validation fails.

Contains meta information about sfdx config properties.

Type:
  • object

ConfigValue

The allowed types stored in a config store.

Type:
  • string | boolean | object

DecipherCallback(buffer)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
buffer Buffer

A buffer containing the decrypted secret.
Returns:

T - The intended type of the object to return. This is implementation specific.

Dictionary

An object with arbitrary string-indexed values of a generic type.

Type:
  • Object.<string, T>

Fields

See:
  • Bunyan Log Record Fields

A collection of named FieldValues.

Type:
  • Object.<string, FieldValue>

FieldValue

All possible field value types.

Type:
  • string | number | boolean

IPromptOptions

Properties:
Name Type Description
prompt string

The prompt string displayed to the user.
type 'normal' | 'mask' | 'hide'

Normal does not hide the user input, mask hides the user input after the user presses ENTER, and hide hides the user input as it is being typed.

A prompt option configuration as defined by oclif/cli-ux.

Type:
  • object

JsonArray

Any JSON-compatible array.

Type:
  • Array.<AnyJson>

JsonMap

Any JSON-compatible object.

Type:
  • Dictionary.<AnyJson>

loaderFunction(locale) → {Message}

A loader function.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
locale string

The local set by the framework.
Returns:

The messages.

Type
Message

LOCATIONS

Properties:
Name Type Description
GLOBAL string

Represents the global config.
LOCAL string

Represents the local project config.
ENVIRONMENT string

Represents environment variables.

An enum of all possible locations for a config value.

LoggerLevel

  • Bunyan Levels
Properties:
Name Type Description
TRACE
DEBUG
INFO
WARN
ERROR
FATAL

Standard Logger levels.

Type:
  • number

LoggerLevelValue

Any numeric Logger level.

LoggerOptions

See:
  • Bunyan Constructor API
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
name string

The logger name.
serializers Serializers <optional>

The logger's serializers.
src boolean <optional>

Whether or not to log source file, line, and function information.
level LoggerLevelValue <optional>

The desired log level.
stream Writable <optional>

A stream to write to.
streams LoggerStream <optional>

An array of streams to write to.

The common set of Logger options.

LoggerStream

See:
  • Bunyan Streams
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
type type <optional>

The type of stream -- may be inferred from other properties.
level level <optional>

The desired log level for the stream.
stream stream <optional>

The stream to write to. Mutually exclusive with path.
path path <optional>

A log file path to write to. Mutually exclusive with stream.
name name <optional>

The name of the stream.
extras any <optional>

Additional type-specific configuration parameters.

A Bunyan stream configuration.

Mode

Properties:
Name Type Description
PRODUCTION string
DEVELOPMENT string
DEMO string
TEST string

Represents an environment mode. Supports production, development, demo, and test with the default mode being production.

To set the mode, export SFDX_ENV=<mode> in your current environment.

OAuth2Options

See:
  • https://jsforce.github.io/jsforce/doc/OAuth2.html

Name Type Description
authzServiceUrl string

clientId string
clientSecret string
httpProxy string

proxyUrl string
redirectUri string

authCode string
privateKeyFile string

Options for OAuth2.

ORG_DEFAULT

Properties:
Name Type Description
DEVHUB string

Default developer hub username.
USERNAME string

Default username.
list function

() => string[] List the Org defaults.

Supported Org Default Types.

Type:
  • object

OrgFields

Properties:
Name Type Description
ALIAS string

The org alias.
CREATED_ORG_INSTANCE string

The Salesforce instance the org was created on. e.g. cs42.
DEV_HUB_USERNAME string

The username of the dev hub org that created this org. Only populated for scratch orgs.
INSTANCE_URL string

The full url of the instance the org lives on.
IS_DEV_HUB string

Is the current org a dev hub org. e.g. They have access to the ScratchOrgInfo object.
LOGIN_URL string

The login url of the org. e.g. https://login.salesforce.com or https://test.salesforce.com.
ORG_ID string

The org ID.
STATUS string

The OrgStatus of the org.

Org Fields.

OrgStatus

Properties:
Name Type Description
ACTIVE string

The scratch org is active.
EXPIRED string

The scratch org has expired.
UNKNOWN string

The org is a scratch Org but no dev hub is indicated.
MISSING string

The dev hub configuration is reporting an active Scratch org but the AuthInfo cannot be found.

Scratch Org status.

SfdxTableOptions

Properties:
Name Type Description
options TableOptions | Array.<string>

A table option configuration type that can be the TableOptions as defined by oclif/cli-ux or a string array of table keys to be used as table headers for simple tables.

Type:
  • object
